name: IMPOSSIBLE CAPTCHA
description:
Made for "So bad it´s good jam".

Story:

In 2065, androids became absolutely indistinguishable from humans. A bloody war with machines began. People were paranoid, the soldiers stopped trusting each other, it was a war of all against all.

You are former Colonel Jerry Sanders, who was taken prisoner and now your only task is to prove that you are human by passing the test of the Captcha.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE 0.2

>Added 2 more Captchas (tasks);
